ValidationRule.description: If Payroll is selected in Product and Regular Payroll Processed is selected in Disc Type, do not require Subject and Desc.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Payroll")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Discrepancy_Type__c, "Regular Payroll Processed")), OR(Subject = "", Description = ""), RecordType.Name = "Service Support PEO", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Description and Subject fields to proceed.
